properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 100259Z MAR
   BY M/V NPS OCEANIC PHOENIX TOWING 12 FIVE MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   23-39.33S 041-10.08W, 23-31.26S 040-51.44W,
   24-31.10S 040-10.31W, 24-23.10S 040-23.27W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 100359Z MAR.
